name: RecruitAmeliaEirika
_source: speak;Eirika;Are you from around here?|You should find someplace to hide.|These men are after me.|It's not safe.
speak;Amelia;I'm a Grado soldier.|I'm here to stop the princess of Renais...
speak;Amelia;And you're Princess Eirika?|But the commander said Eirika's a cruel and merciless fiend...
speak;Eirika;What?|No, I'm...|...I don't know what Grado's officers have been telling you, but...|Our two countries are at war, so I suppose they can say what they want.
speak;Amelia;...Mistress Eirika...|I, uh, I surrender.|I won't fight you.

speak;Amelia;I became a soldier because I admired General Duessel's sense of honor.|But the generals have been very opposed to this war from the beginning...|And now I see you, and you look so sad about all of this.|I don't know what's right anymore.|I'm just a soldier, but I want to decide for myself.|I want to understand the truth myself, to see it with my own eyes.
speak;Eirika;...I see.|So...does this mean you're coming with us?|I suppose I should ask your name then.
